existing_features.title: Add an additional homepage style variant (Style C) that provides a distinct, cohesive color palette for the unauthenticated homepage (PublicOverviewPage + MarketingBanner) in both light and dark modes, without changing existing Style A or Style B behavior.

Define Style C theme overrides using CSS variables in `frontend/src/index.css` (light + dark) under a new scope class (e.g., `.home-style-c` and `.dark .home-style-c`) to achieve a clearly different but consistent palette across background/card/accent/border/ring/muted/secondary.
Update the style toggle control on `frontend/src/pages/PublicOverviewPage.tsx` so users can cycle through A → B → C (and back), and ensure the UI reflects the currently selected variant.

projectName: Add a third homepage color style variation (Style C) for the unauthenticated landing page
